abstract: Big data computing is as much about speed as a surge in data, and that will bring sweeping changes in the computer industry.
snippet: Big data computing is as much about speed as a surge in data, and that will bring sweeping changes in the computer industry.
lead_paragraph: Big data is, yes, about more data -- the rising flood from corporate databases, Web browsing trails, sensors and social network communications. But it is just as much about speed.

headline.main: Big Data, Speed and the Future of Computing
